summary: "A day late / a post short / I'm writing / last week's report"
title: This Week (2024-11-10)

summary: We’ve come to that time of the year again, where folks begin to think about their holiday gift giving, and at least some of you think about books as the perfect gift.  Well, they are.  But would make them even more perfect is getting those books signed and personalized...
title: How to Get Signed & Personalized Books From Me For the Holidays, 2024 Edition
